thread.title: Leicester striker Leonardo Ulloa has handed in a transfer request with West Brom, Sunderland, Swansea and Hull set to swoop
thread.title_full: Leicester striker Leonardo Ulloa has handed in a transfer request with West Brom, Sunderland, Swansea and Hull set to swoop

author: mheathsmith
title: Leicester striker Leonardo Ulloa has handed in a transfer request with West Brom, Sunderland, Swansea and Hull set to swoop
text:
EFL Transfer News Leicester striker Leonardo Ulloa has handed in a transfer request with West Brom, Sunderland, Swansea and Hull set to swoop 
The Argentine is looking for a move after becoming increasingly frustrated at a lack of game time By JOE BALL Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments LEONARDO Ulloa has handed in a transfer request at Leicester City, with four Premier League teams set to enquire. 
The Argentine striker has only played 240 minutes of football this season, and is intent on leaving. PA:Press Association 2 Leonardo Ulloa wants more game time 
West Brom, Sunderland, Swansea and Hull have all been put on alert as they look to boost their attack with the title winner. 
Keep up-to-date with all the latest transfer news and gossip ahead of the January window with SunSport’s daily LIVE blog. 
But Claudio Ranieri is keen to keep the forward with Islam Slimani currently away at the African Cup of Nations with Algeria. 
Leicester turned down a bid the 30-year-old from Spanish club Alaves last week, but it is clear that Ulloa wants out. Related news Claudio Ranieri blocks out-of-favour forward Leonardo Ulloa from leaving due to Foxes' striker shortage Leonar-go Leonardo Ulloa desperate to quit Leicester - with Sunderland ready to pounce in January LEO SEE-YA Leonardo Ulloa tells Claudio Ranieri he wants to leave Leicester for Swansea in £10million deal LEONAR-GO Frustrated striker Leonardo Ulloa ready to quit Leicester in search of a regular first team spot Leo's Swan dive Swansea preparing '£10m bid for Leicester forward Leonardo Ulloa' PA:Press Association 2 Ulloa was part of Leicester’s title winning squad 
Sunderland, Swansea and Hull will all look to boost their squad as they look to escape the relegation zone, but West Brom could see the striker as a replacement for Saido Berahino who has been linked with a move away this transfer window. Leicester 0-3 Chelsea : Leicester's slump continues as The Blues push on 
It has been a different story for the reigning champions this season. They sit 15th, five points of the relegation zone and travel to face Southampton on Sunday.
